mapper.select: select A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, date_format(A.regdt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdt, A.thumbnail, B.favCnt, C.username, C.nickname from diaryDB A INNER JOIN ( SELECT iboard, count(iboard) as favCnt FROM favDB GROUP BY iboard ) B ON A.iboard = B.iboard INNER JOIN userDB C ON A.iuser = C.iuser INNER JOIN favDB D ON A.iboard = D.iboard WHERE D.iuser = #{iuser} ORDER BY B.favCnt DESC
